column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Mako says : " What the heck did all this ? "
#Text=Shopkeeper says : " It was my brother .
#Text=" Shopkeeper says : " We were arguing about the books , and Daw was yelling at me .
#Text=And all of a sudden , things started flying around .
#Text=He was creating this storm , like - " Mako says : " Like what ?
#Text=" Shopkeeper says : " Well , like he was airbending .
#Text=" Mako says : " Sir , that 's impossible .
#Text=There are only five airbenders in the entire world , and , your brother is not one of them .
#Text=" Shopkeeper says : " I know what I saw .
#Text=He was freaking out yelling : " What 's happening to me ?! "
#Text=Then , he ran into the back room and locked himself in .
#Text=" Mako says : " Police .
#Text=Open up .
#Text=" Daw says : " Go away !
#Text=" Mako says : " Get out here , sir , or I 'm knocking this door down .
#Text=One , two -- " Daw says : " I 'm so sorry !
#Text=" Shopkeeper says : " I told you .
#Text=Airbending !
#Text="
